org.littleshoot.proxy

Interface HttpProxyServerBootstrap


  • public interface HttpProxyServerBootstrap
    Configures and starts an HttpProxyServer. The HttpProxyServer is built using start() or #start(boolean, boolean). Sensible defaults are available for all parameters such that #build() could be called immediately if you wish.
